name: n-tara interactive
tag_list: interactive-agency, interactive-marketing, web-design, website-development, online-marketing-strategy, search-marketing, sales-enablement, sales-presentations
overview:
n-tara interactive is a full-service interactive agency that leverages insightful marketing strategy, exceptional creative design, and leading edge technology to create innovative, performance-driven brand experiences. Specializing in web site development, online marketing and sales enablement, n-tara interactive designs unique solutions that solve the communication challenges of marketing and sales organizations.

n-tara interactive is equipped with a team of world-class strategists, award-winning designers and interactive developers to deliver insightful marketing strategy, exceptional creative design, and leading edge technology. The company’s services include:

Customer Insights

  • Competitive analysis
  • Website analysis
  • Customer research
  • Customer segmentation
  • Persona development

Digital Strategy

  • Brand assessment and platform
  • Brand planning
  • Strategic roadmapping
  • Online brand translation
  • Social media strategies

Brand Experiences

  • Website design and development
  • Product and brand microsites
  • Sales enablement solutions
  • Guided selling applications
  • E-commerce integration
  • Game design
  • Copywriting
  • Web content management
  • Rich internet applications
  • Mobile applications
  • Interactive calculators
  • Custom application development

Online Marketing

  • Integrated marketing communications planning
  • Search engine optimization
  • Search engine marketing
  • Email marketing
  • Social media marketing

Analytics

  • Analytics implementation
  • Analytics reporting
  • Analytics dashboards
